A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Everything that I felt when I was a little kid watching Empire Strikes Back or Return of the Jedi rose up in me tonight when I saw The Last Jedi. I laughed! I cried! My mouth was opened in awe! I yelled with great excitement. I wasn't alone either. We all felt it. Different ethnicities\, tax brackets\, life preferences...all of us for two and a half amazing hours were bound by The Force. Brilliant!!!
